idea:
Realtime “Public Information System” in sectors like transportation, retail, hospitality etc. is still under-developed in India.


Lack of effective real-time ETA info display in transportation system, specifically into intra city bus networks creates long wait at origin bus stops. With it, there are some steps taken to display these information’s but setup cost and time is the key factor. We propose to provide efficient product to these scenarios.


We are disrupting public information eco-system, by developing devices and technology which are self-sustainable, eco-friendly and scalable.

This includes two key elements i.e. “Devices” (hardware) which are effective form the Indian context and “Software” technology which enables integration with multiple platforms seamlessly in last mile integration.


We are building devices using e-paper display technology. These are low energy devices with reflective displays, works on solar energy which makes them apt for the outdoor use. With it as these are reflective displays its performance in outdoor is superior as compared to backlit displays.


Secondly, these devices are made to plug & play mode which reduces the conversion/installation time. Possibility to customize them allows to build devices as per requirement to optimize cost and performance.


Overall easy and go to market product with huge scope for build overall smart public information system.
name: SUPERUS SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Naik’s Technology ) is an IT Service and Solution company incorporated in 2020. Startup based out of Thane founded by IT industry's veterans with over 10-20 years of experience in IT software, infrastructure, consulting etc.

The company was conceived with the idea of bringing in cost-effective solutions for business agility within organizations, who wants to use digitization as a springboard to expand their business foot-print. Currently we offer outcome focused technology solutions to enterprises under verticals like Government, Healthcare, cyber security, legal software, Education, EPR Solutions, Digital Marketing, campaign management, etc.

We are giving exclusive focus on e-governance. Our ready e-governance framework which has an integrated suite of application products to manage the complete working of Government, Semi-Government or Public Sector Organizations. We find out the problems & gaps in the government sector and create innovative technological solutions to fill in those gaps

Our Robust and dedicated agile team helps in delivering with precision and on-time. Our team of Software Engineers and developers leveraging the latest technology inventing numerous cost-effective applications.

1. Web Developement

2. Web Designing

3.Mobile Application Development

We are committed to launch ultimate products that everyone needs and we give highest priority to the customer satisfaction more than anything else.

Our unique products with all good features play a vital role in making us successful in the market.

As our target customer base is huge, our revenue generation mainly depends on advertising and reasonable subscription fees
name: NAIK'S TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Tanyugg offers an extensive and impressive range of home curtains. It can certainly deliver custom top notch designs to suit all your needs. This way, you will be able to instantly freshen up your space and give your home it's own personality. Tanyugg’s in-house team of stylists and buyers draw inspiration from global trends to bring stylish and affordable curtains and homeware to a wide spectrum of homes ranging from the traditional to the modern.


If you're searching for an attractive, exceptionally enjoyable space that also ensures ideal privacy, perfect light control, energy efficient, and optimal UV protection for your furniture and carpets, you've come to the right place. You'll get a variety of choices in privacy and light control, along with a wide range of decorating possibilities in fabric, texture, style and colour.
name: Tanyugg Eximm Private Limited
